title: Full Show (Mavs + Celtics win Game 7s, Warriors advance, CP3's legacy, Is Giannis still the best player on the planet?)
description:
00:00 Mavs win Game 7
23:36 Celtics advance
41:35 Warriors beat the Grizzlies
54:04 Dendre Ayton vs. Luka Dončić
1:09:04 Celtics/Heat preview
1:19:40 CP3’s legacy
1:32:17 Mavs/Warriors preview
1:40:57 Is Giannis still the best player on the planet?
1:48:48 Tom Brady
1:53:53 Daryl Morey on Doc Rivers
